channel.title: Adopt OpenRune? (Full resources of RuneServe.com as well)
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I have been having a few legal issues that aren't really important and have decided on sort of "leasing" my talents to somebody who is interested in my proposition.
Anyways I am looking for somebody who is starting a huge project that does not rely on silab's or mopar's clients. This means you or a team of designers have designed your own client and server. If this is true and you plan on working on it for a long period of time and wouldn't mind releasing your designs under the name OpenRune and have the server and client be open source then I have a great deal for you.
I am offering the website openrune.org and all of its features to you. Your downloads can be hosted from the site as well as you will have forums already set up as well as an IRC channel and more features to come. Currently I am working on a developers area for the team (if you choose to have one) to easily make changes to the website and forums.
What you get.. -Admin and everything that comes with it on the forums and website -My incredible web design and programming skill :P -My help with future releases of your server and client
If you ever need anything changed or added to the website then i can do it as soon as i get your message.
Also if you are interested in running the server/client that you have made then we can do that as well all from the website. We can also have it so that people can use our client to connect to their servers as well.
RuneServe is a private server hosting company that will be up and running sometime in the future but if you partake in a agreement with me on OpenRune you will have all the resources of RuneServe.com as well as OpenRune.org.
So if you are interested in partnering up with me then please contact me at sicarius99@gmail.com or one of the instant messengers below.
AIM: Sicarius99 MSN: Sicarius99@gmail.com YIM: Sicarius99@yahoo.com
You can also just leave a message in this topic.
~Sicarius99
